title: Mars and Space - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/25/19
itunes:title: Mars and Space - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/25/19
description:
George Noory and space researcher Sir Charles Shults discuss his theories on what Mars was like millions of years ago, if it could hold human life, and whether mankind would need to leave Earth before it was destroyed by a giant asteroid.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
